Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{3: 'Hiding in an inconspicuous corner on the streets, Murray is fiddling with his terminal and controlling the lure program in his guise.'}
{3: 'Valeria and Yata are closing in on him, creeping to around ten meters behind.'}
{3: "An uncanny hint runs down Murray's spine. He stops controlling the terminal, and the lure program also stands frozen like a statue."}
{3: "Murray turns around. Valeria and Yata walk out of the shadows from both of Murray's flanks."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Ah, as expected of Scarab. Faster than I thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Pah. Whatever you took from Gestalt, you're gonna spit it all out... piece by piece."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Don't try anything funny."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'And if I refuse?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Then we'll be taking it from a dead body. Not much of a difference."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I see... So you've only been ordered to track and intercept, but not to eliminate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Otherwise, I wouldn't even be standing here, would I? You don't want trouble unless things go south, yes?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Which means... we can strike a deal.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata remains unseen, but Murray can feel her appendages surrounding him. They remain at a slight distance, writhing around and checking.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Ahaha, you're learning... But it's okay, I've run out of welcome gifts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Now then, back to the topic.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Murray spreads his hands. The terminal containing a whole host of data is laid bare before Valeria's eyes."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Do you know what's in this?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'I\'m not interested. And if it makes you feel better, we\'re not afraid of "things going south."'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'I see. You\'re "not interested," which is why you ask no questions. For Commander Nikola, you\'d indeed be a handier tool than me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'That must be why he said he approves of my capabilities... but still sent you here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "No... Or perhaps, he really does approve of meâ€”that's why he sent you here. If that's the case, my oh my, what an honor.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Murray's usual smile returns."}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Well then, guess I better not disappoint him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You done?'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "You're a smart guy. Cooperating is in your best interest here."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'But... smart guys should remember to clear their access logs. Pity.'}
{3: "With that, Valeria motions to Yata. Her appendages immediately pierce through Murray's body."}
{3: 'But, he gives no reaction.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Surprise! The lure is the real one, and the real one is the lure.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The phantom Murray, now pierced by several appendages, is no longer moving, but voice is still coming out of his mouth.'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Thank you for your cooperation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'And thank you for listening to my speech. That gave me enough time to unload the immersion program.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Quite a shame I don't get to see your expressions from the lure program, but I bet it'd make a stellar memory.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Blue streams of data begin to disperse from the "lure program" afar.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Dammit, V! Get him!'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'On it.'}
{3: 'Valeria leaps onto the street, rushing for the dissipating Murray.'}
{3: 'But before her hand can reach Murray, he completely vanishes.'}
{3: 'Yata spits out an elegant pejorative, and rips her appendages out from the wall behind the false Murray, now full of holes.'}
{3: 'Almost instantaneously, the Murray explodes before her.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Yata, what's happening?"}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Tch... It's a jamming smokescreen... Some dumb data weapon..."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "What's going on?!"}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'An area alarm... I see.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "So that's what he had planned..."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "That low-level smokescreen won't do much, but it's enough to alert the termination programs in this virtual space."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Tch, looks like they clean up everything with unknown IDs indiscriminately, which includes us.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Whatever it is, we can only... leave now.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Yeah.'}
